meanings.definition: The plural form of squilla, a genus of mantis shrimp.
meanings.sent1: I found some squillae on the beach while exploring.
meanings.sent2: The squillae were hiding in the coral reef.
meanings.sent3: The squillae had a party under the sea, dancing to the rhythm of the waves.
meanings.sent4: The squillae stood out in the ocean like colorful jewels.
meanings.sent5: The squillae scurried across the ocean floor, their vibrant colors mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The plural form of squilla, a type of crustacean.
meanings.sent1: The squillae were delicious when cooked with garlic butter.
meanings.sent2: We observed the squillae moving gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent3: The squillae decided to start a band and play music with their claws.
meanings.sent4: The squillae were like tiny warriors marching across the sand.
meanings.sent5: The squillae scuttled around the aquarium, captivating the visitors with their antics.
